Name: AR15 SBR 5.56x45 Assault Rifle MOD3
Description: The ST AR-15, modified for the third time using a four-star assault rifle template. The modification primarily focuses on reducing recoil, enhancing stability during shooting, and increasing overall performance. Maintenance costs are quadrupled. This is the AR-15 SBR assault rifle used after the third modification of the ST AR-15, chambered in 5.56x45 NATO.
